name: Maroon (Demo BenBonk Jam)
description:
I am an idiot I made all the assets and everything in 72 hours becasue I thought thats the rule. So read the rules carefully kids.

Due to some unfortunate events I am unable to finish this game., but you can checkout the core mechanics and the art style. I will probably start to post game dev logs about this project because I want to finish it so bad. So you can check out my channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu1oUQoT0jMh5cLa8VPRzuQ

Story sets in a  blade runner like word you are the detective who tests people  to see if they are replicant or not.

Durgen : Art & Code

Ogi_Magi: Code

Xash: Music
